alert.note: Alert for Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 3:01AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Little Muddy River near Williston affecting Williams County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Muddy River near Williston. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, CO-8 by gage road has water on it. CO-7B also floods at this level. The Little Muddy Recreation area near Williston floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.4 feet early this afternoon, and then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.5 feet on 03/28/1958. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
